scenes.background: You suggest focusing on the presentation first. [Monica] raises an eyebrow.
scenes.description: [Monica] says, 'Are you sure that's the best approach? What if the report needs more attention?'

options.text: We can reassess after the presentation, but I'll start on the report for now.
options.analysis: You show good emotional perception by suggesting flexibility, but social skills are lower due to potential indecision.

options.text: I believe dividing tasks based on strengths will be more efficient. I'll handle the report.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and social skills by sticking to your plan, but empathy could be better by considering Monica's concerns.

options.text: Let's focus on the presentation first and address the report together afterward.
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation and empathy by suggesting a logical order of tasks, but emotional perception is lower as it delays decision making.
